thread.title: Season 5 of 'Orange is the New Black' gets release date, trailer
thread.title_full: Season 5 of 'Orange is the New Black' gets release date, trailer

author: Saba Hamedy
title: Season 5 of 'Orange is the New Black' gets release date, trailer
text:
Soon all our Season 44 Orange is The New Black cliffhangers will be answered.
Netflix dropped a short 15-second teaser on Wednesday, announcing the drama will return on June. 9.
SEE ALSO: Netflix's 'Iron Fist' trailer looks worthy of its Marvel brethren
Though quick, the teaser still gives us a peak at familiar characters, including Daya who last we saw her was holding a gun over CO Humphrey.
The acclaimed series' fifth season will be 13 episodes.
BONUS: The hidden clues lurking in the 'Stranger Things' Season 2 trailer
